short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your search potential by creating libraries of your trusted internet sources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of your search results being filled with thousands of SEO websites and you still end up clicking on one of the five sites you already know and trust? With this extension you create libraries of websites you trust and search them easily in the Omnibox (Address bar).
Source code: https://github.com/joshpk105/source-search
